critique: The executive order expresses strong disapproval and concern regarding the actions of the South African government. It aims to evoke feelings of disgust and anger towards the South African government's policies and actions, as well as fear and sadness regarding the situation of the Afrikaner population. There may also be an element of surprise at the severity of the situation and the actions taken by the South African government. The intensity of these emotions may vary depending on the reader's perspective and prior knowledge of the situation.
